Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Samarasinha, N.H., B.E.A. Mueller, M.J.S. Belton and L. Jorda, Rotation of Cometary Nuclei, in 'Comets II' (Festou, Keller and Weaver, eds), 281-299, 2004.

Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: Samarasinha, N.H., B.E.A. Mueller, M.J.S. Belton and L. Jorda, ROTATION OF COMET NUCLEI: TABLE 1, EAR-C-COMPIL-5-COMET-NUC-ROTATION-V1.0. NASA Planetary Data System, 2006.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Spin state parameters for 15 comets, collected from the literature by Samarasinha, et al. (2004).
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set presents Table 1 of Samarasinha, et al. (2004): 'Information on spin states of specific comets', as published in 'Comets II' (Festou, Keller and Weaver, eds.).
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set presents Table 1, 'Information on spin states of specific comets' of Samarasinha, et al. (2004). It contains a summary of available data regarding spin states of 25 comets. The data set will be updated periodically as new results are published in the literature.
Processing ========== These data have been keyed in to a flat ASCII tables from the published paper, and reformatted to fit standard PDS/SBN table conventions.
Media/Format ============ These data are available online for immediate downloading.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= Smarasinha, et al. (2004) contains extensive remarks regarding the values in this table. The user is strongly encouraged to consult the published paper for the details.
Review ====== This data set passed external peer review on 06 April 2006.
